price: 98. Lorsque tu lis le Coran, cherche refuge auprès d’Allah contre Satan le Lapidé.
arabic: فَإِذَا قَرَأۡتَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ فَٱسۡتَعِذۡ بِٱللَّهِ مِنَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ ٱلرَّجِيمِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā qarata al-qur'āna fa-is'taʿidh bil-lahi mina al-shayṭāni al-rajīmi
